summary: Own backend systems and APIs for client-facing and internal platforms.

details: Design and implement backend systems and APIs using C#, .NET, and ASP.NET Core.
Make architectural decisions with a focus on multi-tenant and plugin-based systems that enable extensibility without tight coupling or frequent rewrites.
Lead and contribute to the modernisation of legacy platforms, improving structure, test coverage, and long-term sustainability while reducing technical debt.
Define and implement secure authentication and authorisation patterns, including OAuth2 and JWT.
Build reusable shared libraries (NuGet and npm) to promote consistency and reduce duplication across teams.
Collaborate across the stack using TypeScript and Angular when required.
Mentor engineers through code reviews and technical guidance, and act as a senior technical contributor in client engagements.

projects.title: Simple.Interpreter
projects.description: A lightweight C# library providing a straightforward interpreter for a simple, custom expression language. This NuGet package enables developers to empower their customers or clients to define dynamic expressions for various purposes, such as business rules, conditional logic, and data filtering, without requiring code recompilation.

projects.title: Query
projects.description: This is a simple library I wrote, before EF was 'big', that is used to run MySql Commands. It uses reflection in order to map the results to the specified Data type.

projects.title: Simple.Office.Excel
projects.description: This project aims to simplify the interaction with Microsoft Excel files by abstracting underlying libraries such as NPOI. It provides an easy-to-use API for creating, manipulating, and reading data from Excel files.
